snippet: The Treasury Department priced its massive offering of shares in the American International Group at $32.50 each on Monday, as the government pared its stake in the bailed-out insurer below 50 percent.
abstract: The Treasury Department priced its massive offering of shares in the American International Group at $32.50 each on Monday, as the government pared its stake in the bailed-out insurer below 50 percent.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Treasury's A.I.G. Stock Sale Is Priced at $32.50
